Title: Skin Wolves
Legend: Creatures of pure nightmare, Skin Wolves are draped in the tattered remains of their human flesh. Their malice and fury are incomparable, and with long-clawed fingers they shred their victims to ribbons and feast upon the remains.
Intro: Each model in a skin Wolves unit is armed with Teeth and Claws.

Rules.Name: Monstrous Ally
Rules.Rule: MONSTROUS ALLY: This unit can be included as an allied unit in an army whose general has the CHAOS keyword.

Rules.Name: Bounding Predators
Rules.Fluff: These deadly creatures can move at frightening speed.
Rules.Rule: ABILITIES This unit can run and still charge later in the turn.

Rules.Name: Terrifying Bloodlust
Rules.Fluff: Skin Wolves have a natural predatory instinct to hunt. With the taint of Chaos running through their veins, this bloodlust is amplified beyond imagining.
Rules.Rule: If the unmodified hit roll for an attack made by this unit is 6, that attack scores 2 hits on the target instead of 1. Make a wound and save roll for each hit.
